quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you'll get to where God wants you to be.
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
No river can return to its source, yet all rivers must have a beginning.
Dissatisfaction is a great starting point, for it is right there that we have the most power, strength, and energy to push change through.
For last year's words belong to last year's language. And next year's words await another voice. And to make an end is to make a beginning.
Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
Whatever you do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius and power and magic in it.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
One can begin so many things with a new person! - even begin to be a better man.
Morning will come, it has no choice.
Starting over is an acceptance of a past we can't change, an unrelenting conviction that the future can be different, and the stubborn wisdom to use the past to make the future what the past was not.
Every sunset is an opportunity to reset.
Every man should be born again on the first day of January. Start with a fresh page.
Begin today. Declare out loud to the universe that you are willing to let go of struggle and eager to learn through joy.
Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
The secret to living the life of your dreams is to start living the life of your dreams today, in every little way you possibly can.
I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
You don't need endless time and perfect conditions. Do it now. Do it today. Do it for twenty minutes and watch your heart start beating.
The journey of a thousand leagues begins with a single step. So we must never neglect any work of peace within our reach, however small.
Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
What the caterpillar calls the end the rest of the world calls a butterfly.
Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born.
A time comes when you need to stop waiting for the man you want to become and start being the man you want to be.
